menu.name: Medium Pizza (30x30cm) - Choose Your Own Toppings
menu.description:
Preheat an oven to 230 degrees 🔥 put the pizza in for 2 minutes, slice 🔪 and enjoy😊
Choose half 1 ➡ Choose half 2 and put together the perfect pizza for you
The pizza is suitable for about 2-3 diners, depending on the type of pizza you choose

menu.name: Large Pizza  (30x40cm) - Choose Your Own Toppings
menu.description:
Preheat an oven to 230 degrees 🔥 put the pizza in for 2 minutes, slice 🔪 and enjoy😊
Choose half 1 ➡ Choose half 2 and put together the perfect pizza for you
The pizza is suitable for about 3-4 diners, depending on the type of pizza you choose
(30X40)
